dict.acceptation: 加固；使更结实；加强；充实；
求援；得到增援；给予更多的支持；

sent.orig: Reinforce this by cultivating an attitude of gratitude.
sent.trans: 通过培养感激的态度加强这一观点。

sent.orig: So when they arrive at your virtual world it is an ideal opportunity to reinforce it.
sent.trans: 用户登录以后，你要抓住机会，增强他们的购买信心。

sent.orig: And successful aging can reinforce resilience.
sent.trans: 成功老化可增强复原力。

sent.orig: Also, micro-expensive concrete and the planting reinforce bar technique could be applied the strengthening structures.
sent.trans: 微膨胀自密实混凝土和植筋技术可较好地应用于桥梁结构的维修加固工程中。

sent.orig: Reinforce and extend your understanding of accountingproperty, plant, and equipment.
sent.trans: 强化和延伸您对权益、厂房与设备的理解。
